channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mueller's family tells NYT he has Parkinson's disease
item.description: Former Special Counsel Robert Mueller has Parkinson's disease, which prevents him from complying with a request to testify before a congressional comm...

item.title: Giuliani hurt in crash after helping domestic violence victim, spokesperson says
item.description: Rudy Giuliani was hospitalized after a car crash in New Hampshire that left him with injuries including a fractured vertebra, his security chief said ...

item.title: Hundreds killed after 6.0-magnitude earthquake strikes Afghanistan
item.description: A 6.0-magnitude earthquake that struck eastern Afghanistan near the border with Pakistan on Sunday night has killed more than 600 people and wounded o...

item.title: Pope Leo urges end to "pandemic of arms" after Minnesota shooting
item.description: Pope Leo XIV offered his prayers for the Minneapolis Catholic school shooting victims and called for an end to the "pandemic of arms, large and small"...

item.title: Judge halts deportation of hundreds of Guatemalan children
item.description: A federal judge told the Trump administration not to deport 10 Guatemalan children in a temporary order on Sunday that also blocks the removal of hund...

item.title: Five burning questions about Trump, Democrats in this fall’s elections
item.description: While he is not on the ballot this year, views of Trump and his administration are factoring prominently into the marquee competitions.

item.title: The Supreme Court has expanded Trump’s power. He’s seeking much more.
item.description: The president’s firing of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook and other cases could serve as major tests of how far the high court is willing to go to ...

item.title: Medicaid cuts threaten rural hospitals — and access to maternity care
item.description: Medicaid cuts in Trump’s One Big Beautiful Bill threaten rural hospitals, risking service cuts and closures that could severely limit access to matern...

item.title: Chicago launches resistance campaign as Trump threatens to send troops
item.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker (D) on Sunday said he is making every effort to stop President Donald Trump “from using the military to invade states.”

item.title: Giuliani hospitalized with multiple injuries after car crash
item.description: Former New York mayor Rudy Giuliani fractured his vertebra after the car he was in was struck from behind on a highway in New Hampshire, authorities s...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
